import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { ShoppingCart, Search, Menu, MapPin, User, Package, MessageSquare, ChevronDown, Bell } from 'lucide-react'; import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'; const Header = () => { const [location, setLocation] = useState('Select Location'); const [trackingId, setTrackingId] = useState(''); const categories = { emergency: [ 'First Aid', 'Medical Supplies', 'Emergency Food', 'Safety Equipment', ], regular: [ 'Groceries', 'Home Essentials', 'Personal Care', 'Electronics', ] }; const handleLocationDetect = () => { // In a real implementation, you would use the Geolocation API navigator.geolocation?.getCurrentPosition( position => { setLocation('Current Location'); }, error => { console.error('Location error:', error); } ); }; return (
{/* Top bar with tracking and support */}
Track Order: setTrackingId(e.target.value)} />
{/* Main header */}
{/* Logo and Location */}

ValueCart

{/* Search Bar */}
{/* Navigation and Actions */}
{/* Categories Dropdown */}
Emergency {categories.emergency.map((item) => ( {item} ))} Regular {categories.regular.map((item) => ( {item} ))}
{/* User Profile */} Profile My Orders Settings Logout {/* Cart */} {/* Mobile Menu */}
{/* Mobile Search (visible only on mobile) */}
); }; export default Header;
